Description:
 
    Overview Description:  

      After creating fabric alters, the Data server will be shut down. Any following requests will receive the following error message

11/22/06 1:26:43 PM SRV0024E: The requested service provider has been shutdown. 
Data server log showed the following error messages
11/22/06 1:26:39 PM SRV0068E: Agent service provider thread has died unexpectedly.
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
	at org.eclipse.aperi.server.handler.gui.AlertDefChangeDetectThread.run(AlertDefChangeDetectThread.java:34)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.aperi.util.osgi.ServiceHelper.bindLocal(ServiceHelper.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.infrastructure.history.detectability.ChangeDetection.<clinit>(ChangeDetection.java:112)
	... 2 more
11/22/06 1:26:39 PM SRV0021I: Shutting down service provider GUI.
11/22/06 1:26:39 PM SRV0021I: Shutting down service provider Agent.
11/22/06 1:26:43 PM GEN7076E: Error processing request from host <tivoli14>, user <administrator>,
                         for service <GUI>, (org.eclipse.aperi.server.svp.GuiSvp, org.eclipse.aperi.server.handler.gui.AlertDefHndlr)
11/22/06 1:26:43 PM SRV0024E: The requested service provider has been shutdown.   

    Steps to Reproduce: 
       Creating any fabric alter through Fabric Manager -> Alerting 
                                                           -> Fabric Alerts
                                                           -> Switch Alerts
                                                           -> EP Alerts 

    Actual Results:  
       The creating fabric alters worked but it will shut down data serevr 

    Expected Results:  
       The creating fabric alters works without breaking any services
  
    Build Date & Platform:  
       Aperi-20061121-1100.zip build running on windows platform
The defect can be confirmed using the latest code.
This bug required some fixes to the way ChangeDetection gets the services required.
